data.eml:eml: Merothripidae from Malaysia: Merothrips with one new species and two new species records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Y. F., Mound, L. A. (2018): Merothripidae from Malaysia: Merothrips with one new species and two new species records. Zootaxa 4407 (3): 447-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4407.3.12
